summary: Shyvana is a playable character in Skyrim! You start at lvl 0 but with some skills and perks that the ice queen needs to survive.
descriptionHtml:
So for those that don\'t know me. I am artist on deviant and in my free time I make costume characters in Skyrim and some people wanted me to make my character public in a simple mod.

See a more highrez screenshot go here: http://trifalien.deviantart.com/art/Ice-Shyvana-in-Skyrim-2-377931789

The Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE), is REQUIRED to run the Mod.
Get it here: http://skse.silverlock.org/

This is a savegame and you don\'t need to download anything else ,only (SKSE).
its simple the mods at the bottom are optional  

Now, this is a mash-up of a lot of random mods and I don\'t take credit for making them that\'s ridicules.
Here\'s the people that take the credit:

RaceMenu by Expired
Flyable Dragon Races REVAMPED by ElSte17
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
Triss Armor Retextured by Psyke23 and oldholo
Battle Claws by Loshirai14
Crown Helmets by pnkrd
Beauty Faces for females by necKros
New Animation for 1 Handed Weapon by xp32
Female Animation Pack by NonokuraSan
Run Sprint and Jump by Bergzore

Costume textures done by me
 
Now installation is very easy just extract and load, all that you need is to put all the right things in the right place.

I will like to recommend some mods to use with this.
Footprints by jonwd7
Get Snowy by Trebtreb
Burn Freeze Shock Effects by pauderek
Deadly Mutilation - dismemberment blood and gore by Lamer1000

Hope you enjoy my custom character.
author: Trif Mircea GDIGE
